import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function SignUp() { let [signUpData, setSignUpData]= useState( { firstname: "", lastname: "", email: "", password: "", username: "", } ) function handleInput(e) { setSignUpData({...signUpData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } function handleSignUpClick() { fetch("http://localhost:4000/memebook", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-type": "App" } }) } return (








By clicking the "SignUp" button below, you agree to all terms and conditions

Sign Up
); }
